sentences.sContent: Joplin is considered the foremost composer of ragtime music.
sentences.sContent_eng: Joplin is considered the foremost composer of ragtime music.
sentences.sCn: 吉普林被认为是拉格泰姆（Ragtime）音乐最重要的作曲家。

sentences.sContent: He has recorded every major work for the violin, and has also recorded jazz, ragtime and Jewish folk music.
sentences.sContent_eng: He has recorded every major work for the violin, and has also recorded jazz, ragtime and Jewish folk music.
sentences.sCn: 他录制了每一首主要的小提琴曲，爵士乐，拉格泰姆以及犹太人民间音乐。

trans.tranOther: a type of music and dancing that has a strong beat and was popular in the US in the early part of the 20th century
